Posts.Content: Melissa_P wrote: Good Morning, or so I had thought!!! I had tried to get in touch with the hospital that had done my mammogram and ultrasounds last week, and the films had been read, but they wanted me to talk to my dr first. I did call my dr with no luck actually speaking to some one! I have waited for them to call back, but nothing yet. I got a call from the radiology dept at the hospital, the asked me to come back today for another mammogram and now I am super scared ! Log in to post a reply

Posts.Title: New Here, with questions !!! Melissa_P sewingnut

Posts.Content: Melissa_P wrote: Hi everyone !!! I am Melissa, a 40 year old, with some fears and questions. My maternal grandmother was diagnosed with breast cancer, and had a mastectomy, with nodes removed. Later the breast cancer spread however, and went into her brain, and she passed away.  I, found a lump, in my arm pit area. Actually, two now. They are larger then peas. I went to my dr for my anual, (I also get regular mammograms too) He said that they are nodes for sure. He also found a lump in my breast as well. Wants me to have a diagnostic mammogram and also a ultrasound. Then, he also was able to get a "discharge" from my left nipple. It was not though bloody.  The radiology department was not able to get me in however until September 25th, and that is nearly two weeks away, ... two weeks of worrying, and frustration and fears! I am the first on the cancellation list however! Can anyone please give me any input? Thanks so much in advance !!! Melissa Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: New Here, with questions !!! Melissa_P sewingnut

Posts.Content: Sep 12, 2012 10:49AM Melissa_P wrote: They got me in tomorrow after all. So now only 24 hours to wait out !!!
Posts.Title: New Here, with questions !!! Melissa_P sewingnut

Posts.Content: Sep 12, 2012 08:43AM Melissa_P wrote: Thanks so much for the reply to my post !!! I do already know as well, I have very dense breast tissue, from prior mammograms. It is so scary, to be left wondering !!! UGH !!! I cried some tears yesterday, felt good to let it out, but am still very scared !!! I will say prayers for you as well, and keep looking for your update !
